segments.text: How do you like your job here , Linda ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's interesting , I like being an editor .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like talking to writers , I get to meet a lot of interesting people .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm happy to hear that , but publishing is more than just talking to writers . it involves a lot of work , patience and responsibility . Most of the work is boring .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't feel bored at all . I'm getting along with my colleagues . I will enjoy working with them . People are great in this industry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I have no complaints . I hear there are many opportunities to move up in this company . is that true ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you have many opportunities to grow in this company as long as you do well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's perfect . I will definitely do well .
segments.speaker: S2
